name: eleventy-base
description: This is the starting point for Eleventy projects

scripts.img: mkdir -p src/img/ && mkdir -p dist/assets/img/ && cp -a src/img/. dist/assets/img/
scripts.js: mkdir -p src/js/ && mkdir -p dist/assets/js/ && cp -a src/js/. dist/assets/js/
scripts.build:assets: npm run img && npm run js && npm run sass && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.build: npm run clear && npm run build:assets && npm run build:eleventy
scripts.watch:css: onchange 'src/scss' -- npm run sass && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.start: npm run clear && npm run build:assets && run-p serve watch:assets
scripts.staging:
npm run build && echo 'User-agent: *
Disallow: /' > dist/robots.txt
scripts.bump:major: bump major --commit 'Bumps version number to %s' --tag '%s' src/site/_data/site.json *.json
scripts.bump:minor: bump minor --commit 'Bumps version number to %s' --tag '%s' src/site/_data/site.json *.json
scripts.bump:patch: bump patch --commit 'Bumps version number to %s' --tag '%s' src/site/_data/site.json *.json

author: Martin Underhill
